mapper.insert: insert into sck_abgc(sckid,xmkid,scqdzh,sczdzh,sczlc,scyhlc,tzgs,spwh,fapgdw,fascdw,faspsj,jsxz,jsnr,scbz,scbmbm,sck_sbzt, sck_shzt,sck_lxbm,sck_lxmc,sck_sbthcd,lrjh,bzls,scxmnf,nsqbzzj) values(sys_guid(),#{xmkid},#{scqdzh},#{sczdzh},#{sczlc},#{scyhlc},#{tzgs},#{spwh},#{fapgdw},#{fascdw},#{faspsj},#{jsxz},#{jsnr},#{scbz}, #{scbmbm},'未上报','未审核',#{lxbm},#{lxmc},#{sck_sbthcd},'未列入',#{bzls},#{scxmnf},#{nsqbzzj})
update sck_abgc set lrjh='已列入' where sckid=#{String}
mapper.select: select * from sck_abgc t join xmk_abgc on xmkid=xmk_abgc.id where sckid=#{sckid}
mapper.update: update sck_abgc set sck_sbzt='已上报', sck_sbsj=sysdate,sck_sbbm=#{sck_sbbm}, sck_sbthcd=#{sck_sbthcd} where sckid =#{sckid}
update sck_abgc set sck_shzt='已审核',lrjh='已列入',sck_shsj=sysdate,sck_shbm=#{sck_shbm} where sckid=#{sckid}
update sck_abgc set sck_sbthcd=(sck_sbthcd+2) where sckid =#{String}
mapper.select:
select * from xmk_abgc where shzt='已审核'
and tbbmbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydwbm}||'%' or parent like #{gydwbm}||'%')
and lxbm=#{lxbm}
and to_number(qdzh) <=to_number(#{qdzh})
and to_number(zdzh) >=to_number(#{zdzh})

select xzqhdm v_0,xzqhmc v_1,lxbm v_2,lxmc v_3,qdzh v_4,zdzh v_5,qzlc v_6,yhlc v_7,gjxjnd v_8 from xmk_abgc where shzt='已审核' and id not in (select xmkid from sck_abgc)
and tbbmbm like #{tbdw}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into sck_abgc(sckid,xmkid, scqdzh,sczdzh,sczlc,scyhlc,fapgdw,fascdw,faspsj,spwh,tzgs,jsxz,jsnr,scbz,sck_sbzt,sck_shzt,sck_lxbm,sck_lxmc,scbmbm,sck_sbthcd,lrjh,bzls) values(sys_guid(),(select ID from XMK_ABGC where lxbm=trim(#{2}) and lxmc=trim(#{3})), #{9},#{10},to_number(#{10})-to_number(#{9}),#{11},#{12},#{13},#{14},#{15},#{16},#{17},#{18},#{19},'未上报','未审核',#{2},#{3},#{scbmbm},#{sck_sbthcd},'未列入','无')
mapper.update: update xmk_abgc set xmnf=#{xmnf} where id=#{xmkid}
